content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find this apartment to be a great fit for your needs. How much are you hoping to spend on rent each month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm looking for an apartment in the city center, so I expect to pay around 1000 Euros. However, since this apartment is unfurnished, I think a more appropriate price would be around 900 Euros.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, 900 Euros is a very fair price for an unfurnished apartment in the city center. I'm sure you'll find it to be a great deal. Would you be willing to sign a one-year lease at that price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Yes, I would be willing to sign a one-year lease at 900 Euros. However, I noticed that the apartment is newly built. Considering the fact that I will be the first tenant, I think a price of 850 Euros would be more appropriate. I am a dependable tenant and I will take good care of the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, you make a compelling argument. As the first tenant in a newly built apartment, you should enjoy a bit of a discount. 850 Euros seems like a fair price for both parties. I agree to the price of 850 Euros! Let's proceed with the lease.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 850 Euros! Let's proceed with the lease.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Excellent, Max! We'll get the lease drafted for you right away. Is there anything else you would like to discuss before we finalize the agreement?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: No, I don't have any other questions or concerns. Looking forward to signing the lease.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Wonderful, Max. We'll have the lease ready for you shortly. Thank you for choosing my apartment. I'm sure you'll be very happy here. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: No, thank you. I appreciate your help and look forward to moving into the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: You're welcome, Max. I'm glad to have you as a tenant. If you have any issues or need assistance with anything, don't hesitate to contact me. Enjoy your new home! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
